nicknames.nickname: heir to the throne of Hell

case.state: Behold the mighty Zeke! Von! Genbu! Bringer of Chaos! Mostly known as Zeke, and often addressed as The Zekenator!
Beware! You face the mighty Zeke! Von! Genbu! Bringer of Chaos! Also known as Zeke, and often addressed as The Zekenator!
It's time for Zeke Von Genbu, Bringer of Chaos, to throw down with the rest of you!
It's time for the Zekenator to make his entrance. Behold, I am Zeke Von Genbu, Bringer of Chaos!
... and this is my companion Blade, Pandoria! She's the wielder of the Big Bang Edge! The harbinger of catastrophe!
... and by my side is Pandoria, my companion Blade! The wielder of the Big Bang Edge! The oncoming storm!
... and this is my companion Blade, Pandoria -- the wielder of the-- wait, where did everybody go?
I'm seeing double! Four Pandorias! Is this a dream come true?<hr>{pandy}The resemblance is uncanny, but she doesn't look as zappy as me.
Pandy, have you mastered the ninja clone technique? I'm seeing two of you!<hr>{pandy}She does look a lot like me, doesn't she? I don't see any bulbs on her, though...
It's a pleasant surprise to see the Aegis herself here to strip with us lowlifes!<hr>{pandy}Hey, Mythra!
Saying that I'm surprised to see the Aegis here is an understatement.<hr>{pandy}Hey, Mythra!
Two blades with phenomenal power over lightning! This game is going to be quite... shocking!<hr>{pandy}Hey, Kora! Nice to see you here!
So, the electrifying champion of girl power herself has come to play?<hr>{pandy}Hey, Kora! It's gonna be fun with you here!
{pandy}You've got a strange way of looking at things, Sofia, but we accept your challenge!

test.value: blunt 4k get money make money year 2000

case.state: Is that really you? Listen, mate. It's been a while, but my writer still wishes you well.<hr>{pandy}Yeah! Keep living your best life, Blunt 4k.
{pandy}You know... I think calling this a five-person table is underselling it a little! There's me, and them... and them...{!reset}
{pandy}It's getting pretty crowded ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here. There's me, and them... and them...{!reset}
{pandy}Ooh, looks like this is gonna be a three-seat free-for-all! Don't worry, my prince, I'll back you up!{!reset}
{pandy}Wait a sec... If there's a couple of free seats, can I jump in? ... Actually, nah. I'd better back Zeke up. Who knows how he'll do without me?{!reset}<hr>Pandy, I'm right here.
Darkness envelops the world in its Stygian embrace... Be careful how you go, chums!
{pandy}Looks like we have a full house! That's also a poker thing, hehe! I know my stuff.{!reset}
{pandy}No time to get started like the present! I'll be backing you up to the very end, my prince!{!reset}
{pandy}Let's get this show on the road! I'll be backing you up through thick and thin, my prince!{!reset}

Wait, have we joined the strip poker table? Thank the Architect, that's much more interesting!
{pandy}Yeah! Plus we don't have money to buy-in to the other game.
{pandy}Looks like I'm kinda barging in on the men's night, huh? I'll stick around, buuut I'll keep it down a little.
Set the penis marker to the default state of soft
Make penis hard because a crotch is visible
Make penis hard because a crotch is visible
Make penis hard because a chest is visible
Make penis hard because a chest is visible
allowsex
This entire hand cannot work! Give us five new cards!
Five new cards, on the double!
The Zekenator doesn't need any new cards!
No need to swap what's already perfect!
The Zekenator needs ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
Anonymous dealer! Provide me with ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
I dare say we might need to swap... ~cards.text~!
Gimmie ~cards.text~ new ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, quickly!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, quickly!
I'll blindly swap ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~!
Gimmie a good hand!!
{pandy}You should totally swap ~cards.text~ this round, my Prince!{!reset}
{pandy}Trust me, Zeke, you need to swap ~cards.text~ this time.{!reset}
{pandy}I don't think we even need to say out loud how many cards we swap... But it's part of the fun, isn't it?{!reset}
{pandy}You know, I don't think how quickly you swap your cards will have any effect on how well you do...{!reset}<hr>I know. But it's fun!
{pandy}Zapping away ~cards.text~ of them!
I must say, it feels good to be able to stand on solid terra firma. No more falling off of high places for the Zekenator!
The fact that this continent of yours isn't on the back of a constantly shifting titan still bemuses me. On the plus, it makes me feel safer where I stand!
Oh, yeah! I'm really feelin' it with this one!
These cards totally have the right energy!

With my Righteous Hand of Stormthunder, I shall overwhelm you!
{pandy}Pfft~
Whoops! Almost went and revealed my incredible power!
Behold, your demise is imminent with this hand of righteous justice!
And the mighty Zekenator manages to pull off another good hand!
My incredible skill knows no bounds!
It's early days for us yet, Pandy. But I'm confident in our chances!
I can feel my blood boiling, flowing through me! We've got this!
The Zekenator strikes again!
Absolute child's play! This round will be ours for the taking!
Hahaha! My brilliant and cunning plan worked perfectly!<hr>{pandy}Haha! Wait, you had a plan...?
If you fancy your chances at beating us, how about you go double or nothing, eh?
With our incredible might combined, victory is assured!
Thanks to Pandy, lightning always strikes twice for the Zekenator!
Like eliminating a weak-sauce Pippito, this round is ours for the taking!
Haha! Luck is finally on my side! Bloody brilliant!

We should get a pianist ~background.if.indoors(in|out)~ here to play Bringer of Chaos -- Ultimate for us!
{pandy}On a piano...?
About damn time our luck turned around!
I knew our luck would turn around eventually! ... Emphasis on eventually.
We didn't need to bribe the card dealer after all!<hr>{pandy}Thank goodness we didn't have any money to bribe them in the first place.
I know, I know. Take a good look at the Zekenator and his companion. You're jealous of our magnificence, I get it.
{pandy}We make an awesome team, my prince!{!reset}<hr>Quite right, Pandy!
{pandy}It's reassuring to know that no matter how big the competition is, your chest will always be bigger, Zeke.{!reset}<hr>Yes, that's-- huh?
I'm surprised we haven't lost in a fair while.<hr>{pandy}You're going to jinx it, my prince.
{pandy}Don't get cocky, my prince. We're doing okay now, but we need to be on guard.<hr>{!reset}Well said, Pandy. Though it might not help us right this second.
Traversing all of Alrest several times over really gives your legs a run for their money.<hr>{pandy}Which is saying something, considering we're broke.
Hmm. Hey, Pandy. I just had a thought...<hr>{pandy}Oh no.{!reset}<hr>Don't be so quick to judge, I didn't even tell you what it was yet!
I've got three important, brilliant, and complicated things I need to get off my chest. One-- Oh wait, my cards. Forget about it!
Can we make anything with this hand?<hr>{pandy}Uhh... {pandy smaller}~self.hand~?
Let's grab victory by the horns!<hr>{pandy}That's the spirit, my prince!
Hardly remarkable. So unremarkable, it's not even remarkable to remark upon it.
I do wish I had dictionary with me; I could come up with a flurry of card-based puns for our next special move.
Not exactly the card hand of legends...
Is it too early to begin discussing post-game plans? I'd love to hear what you lot have in mind for winding down.
So incredibly glad to be away from home. The stiffs back at the palace would never approve of a game of this nature.
Heh heh...<hr>{pandy}Hehehe...{!reset}<hr>Heh heh heh...
I wonder what else we could get away with...<hr>{pandy}One step at a time, my prince.
The closer we get to total nudity, the more fired up and evasive I feel! This could be a valid strategy for us in battle.
How're you feeling, Pandy? Are you fine being this exposed?<hr>{pandy}Aw. Don't worry about me, my Prince!
I've got no problems on my end. Let's skip to the part where we win the round, mhm?
Keep your guard up, lest your foes invite themselves in for a cuppa and track mud all over your furniture! Where was I going with this?
{pandy}Did you know I can unplug my tail? What if I counted that as an item?{!reset}<hr>I dread to think what I've have to `unplug' in exchange.
Quickly, Pandy! Fighting pose number seven!<hr>{pandy}We didn't come up with a number seven yet.{!reset}<hr>Oh, right! Use the normal one, then!
Come on, then! Come and have a go if you think you're hard enough!
What would you rate our chances of success, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}Er... Five out of ten? I dunno.

Pandoria here would love to sing a song to express how happy she is!
{pandy}I hate you.{!reset}
No you don't.
I should really pick up some card tricks. You never know, could come in handy one day.
My ongoing contempt for my luck is palpable, is it not?
Gah! Blasted cards... Pandy, do the glasses thing to show our disdain!<hr>{pandy}Already on it.
Hahahah! Of course we'd get another bad hand!<hr>{pandy}Try to keep it together, my prince...
Pandoria, analysis!<hr>{pandy}... We're boned.
What a bunch of rinky-dink, bogus, two-bit, no-good cards!<hr>{pandy}Yeah, that'll show 'em!
Gah! Why do I even bother?
Blast it! This isn't working out at all.
Beware the Eye of Shining Justice, for if its power was ever to be unleashed early, this place would be naught but ash! {smaller}Don't look at my cards.
Remain calm, Pandy!<hr>{pandy}Somehow, you saying that makes me the opposite of calm.
No, no, no! Drat, my plan didn't work!

I thought I'd seen the last of you, you lousy card!
{pandy}You can't fight the playing cards, my prince...
Victory is slipping out of my iron-wrought grip...
Bugger. It seems I'm able to wrestle defeat from the clutches of victory.
Darn it all, I thought I got rid of you! Pesky cards...
Trust me, the Zekenator has learned a thing or two about surviving impossible odds!
Bah! My heart just leapt face-first off a cliff looking at these.<hr>{pandy}Better luck next round?
We may be about to lose, but at least we making losing look good.
We're edging closer to the end of the game, I can feel it in my hands!<hr>{pandy}... Wanna try that one again?

Even if I lose, what matters is that we got to have a lot of fun!
{pandy}We're kinda in a bad spot this round, just FYI.
Truly a cringeworthy display by yours truly...
Gah! My old war wound ached a little, and I lost focus.<hr>{pandy}Are you feeling okay?{!reset}<hr>Yes, yes. I'll be grand.
Hmm... Not my best showing.<hr>{pandy}Meh...
Oh, crumbs.
We're bound to get a few duds here and there.
The cards have regrettably betrayed us this time. Oh well. It was about time.
Flawless victory is boring anyway!
Such kind-hearted behaviour from Mia... Why, it's enough to move me.
We could share hot gossip about Rex and his girlfriends, couldn't we?<hr>{pandy}Hmm... That'd be rude though, wouldn't it?
W-What is this killing intent I feel from Kyou? Her aura of malevolence is unparalleled!
If you want an honest opinion, Sucrose, I'll say this. You look totally desirable in that lingerie of yours.<hr>{pandy}Agreed!
Usually? No, this is a pretty big departure from what we normally do.
{pandy}Nah, we don't do this kind of thing regularly. But that makes it all the more fun! It's a special occasion!
That's right, Arle! The Zekenator and Pandoria are a two-in-one foe!<hr>{pandy}Don't hold back, because we won't!

{pandy}Psst. Prince, get a good look at Gloria's butt while you can.{!reset}
Nice one, Pandy.
{pandy}Ooh! That's a neat trick, Toph! You know, I can make electronics turn on and off at a distance.

{smaller pandy}My prince, I have an idea regarding Sucrose...{!reset}
Hmm? Whisper it to me.
...
Good idea, Pandy. I'll ask her next time.
I suppose the similarities between you two are only surface-level.<hr>{pandy}Still, it's cool to see someone else rocking the green hair and glasses look!
{pandy}I'm not really a photosynthesising kind of girl, but I'm sure my light can only do good things for your petals.
Nice to meet you, Sanako! I'm Zeke, this is Pandoria. You're looking at two of the strongest fighters in Alrest!
Ah, formal introductions! I'm Zeke, this is Pandoria. We're two of the most premium-quality fighters in Alrest!
Hrm. Eichi, I don't know how to tell you this, but you seem rather out of touch with the common folk. You're treating their daily lives like a hobby, no?
Allow me to offer you some advice, Eichi my old chum. If you treat such common novelties as... well, a novelty, then you will never connect with them.
A body like mine is a combination of natural gift and constant training.<hr>{pandy}And the answer to that second one is... I'm very durable.
Constant training and a little bit of being naturally gifted are how you get a physique like mine.<hr>{pandy}And as for how I handle it? Well... I'm more durable than I look.
{pandy}I'll be honest, Sucrose, even though I am a Blade, I don't really know how my body works. I guess my bulbs are kinda made of glass? I've never cracked before, and I've been hit pretty hard.
Sucrose, don't take my little joke so seriously. You and Pandy are obviously far from being completely identical.<hr>{pandy}Also, yeah, I need my glasses to see.
Ah, yes. This piece of Core Crystal lodged in my chest is actually part of Pandy's core. Long story, but it had to be done in order to save my life. Technically, it makes me a `Blade Eater'.
You sensed the Core Crystal shard in my chest already? Well, if you must know, it is a part of Pandy's core. Long story, but it was done to save my life. It technically makes me a `Blade Eater'...
{small}... I feel like we should refuse. We should refuse, right?<hr>{pandy small}She's most definitely trying to lure someone into a trap. Let's not go to her place.
{pandy}Okay, that's just cheating. You can't just say things like that, Spooky. What kind of idiot would fall for it-- right, my prince?{!reset}<hr>Yes, Pandy.
A "soul job" sounds like it'd hurt a fair bit. I'd rather not risk it, thank you very much.<hr>{pandy}Plus, that's part of the trap as well, right?
Scars like that tell many tales -- and yours shows one of bravery and conviction!<hr>{pandy}Mhm!
I'm suddenly feeling quite motivated to lose. Pandy?<hr>{pandy}It's the strangest thing, really.
{pandy}It's pretty cold out here, isn't it?<hr>{!reset}Really? I don't feel bothered.<hr>{pandy}Well, you are naturally dense. Makes for good insulation.
By the way, top notch work on that dynamic entrance of yours, Queenie. An expert demonstration on making a flashy appearance.
{pandy}You know what, my prince? Given the company, I'm suddenly realizing you could've come out a lot worse.{!reset}<hr>Hah. I see.
Sorry to spoil the fun, Bowsette, but Pandy never leaves my side!
Sorry, Bowsette, but Pandy goes where I go!<hr>{pandy}I won't get in the way of your bro-moments.<hr>{!reset}Broments?
Of course not, Sweetie!<hr>{pandy}Yeah, why would we? We're the ones who are abnormally open about things.
Our combined relationship from here can go wherever you want, Sucrose.<hr>{pandy}Though, we can't really promise any long-term commitments right now...
{pandy}Maybe some other time, Sweetie. Actually, hit me up when we're done here. I wanna take you out to dinner.
That's great to hear, Sucrose. We wish only the best for those that get rumbled by the Zekenator.
{pandy}Hey, Sweetie? If your legs or butt are feeling a bit sore after that, try not to lean on them too much. Trust me.
We have been doing things a little backwards to~background.time~, eh? A date sounds wonderful.<hr>{pandy}Yeah!

{pandy}It... does tend to leave you feeling that way, yeah.
{!reset}Pandy, I think she meant it in a more emotional way.
{pandy}It could be both ways.
We may need to enlist your help for things other than outrageous sex romps, Sweetie!<hr>{pandy}And if you ever need us to lend a hand, just ask.
We may need to enlist your help for things other than outrageous sex romps, Sweetie!<hr>{pandy}And if you ever need us to lend a hand, just ask.
Bah! Sucrose, I didn't even-- It didn't even cross my mind!<hr>{pandy}Good thing you're more prepared than we were...
Sorry, chum. We'd offer to spare you some dosh for the journey home, but...<hr>{pandy}We're flat broke.
Actually, the thought had crossed my mind. I imagine I'd be some kind of hammer Blade. Pandy might struggle to carry it.<hr>{pandy}I don't mind being a Blade, but being a human sounds cool too!
Throw me in the middle of anything, and I'll emerge victorious! I won't even need to unleash The Eye of Shining Justice to overcome the odds!
The concern is appreciated, Beatrix, but I'm afraid I must decline. If you remove this core crystal shard, I might literally die on the spot.
Unfortunately, Beatrix, this core crystal shard is the only thing keeping me alive. Or at least, it was. I don't want to risk my life and Pandy's manifestation on a risk like that.
If I died and found myself in the antechamber of the afterlife, then I could be damned sure Pandy wouldn't be with me -- I can weather any torture so long as she is with me.
A "Plus Anima", eh? That's not something I've heard of before.<hr>{pandy}It must be specific to her world, then.
I feel like I'm a bit conked out this round.<hr>{pandy}Huh? What does that even mean?{!reset}<hr>It means I'm feeling sleepy.
Good for Matt!<hr>{pandy}Unfortunately, I get the feeling that if we did win it big, we'd immediately get struck by bad luck...
So, that device of yours can size up someone's fighting aura, eh, ~player~? Well, give us a go!<hr>{pandy}I wonder what my aura looks like...
If that device of yours can see a person's life force, you should give us a spin! Get my good side!<hr>{pandy}Wait, does it look through our clothes?
Trying to size up our incredible battle power, eh ~player~? Well, get a good look!<hr>{pandy}I wonder how we look...
Trying to capture a glimpse at our battle aura, eh ~player~? Well, chum, get my good side!<hr>{pandy}Wait, does it show our clothes, or no?
I'm awfully parched. Would anybody mind getting a drink for me?<hr>{pandy}He'd get one himself, but... we're flat broke.
I'm feeling a little parched. If only the drinks weren't off-limits to me at this time.<hr>{pandy}It's not that he can't drink, or anything. We're just flat broke.
Blimey. Caitlin's sporting more hair than Dromarch, and he's a literal lion-shaped beast Blade.<hr>{pandy}Pffhaha! Nice one, my prince.

On the subject of books -- Pandy, did you ever finish that copy of How Wars Profit Nopon?
{pandy}Uh, no. I think I left it back in Alba Cavanich.

If you would like me to exposit a little, perhaps I should explain something. Pandy here is my Blade; quite literally, she summons a greatsword for me to wield into battle. And I wield it with greatness!
Stop everything! Has anyone seen Turters?<hr>{pandy}Hmm... There are a limited number of places he can go. He'll be fine, I'm sure.

H-Huh? Turters? Where are you boy? Turters?
{pandy}Stay calm. He's probably just exploring the area. We'll find him later, I'm sure of it!
With the energy I'm feeling to~background.time~, Dagas would be right at home.<hr>{pandy}Meh... He'd never play nice with others long enough to enjoy the game.
If we put our heads together, we'll be unstoppable, Pandy!<hr>{pandy}That's right! Bring it on!
The two of us will have no trouble dealing with the rest of you unskilled reprobates. Isn't that right, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}Yeah! Bring it!
As Driver and Blade, working in tandem, the two of us will be an unstoppable force!<hr>{pandy}We've got this in the bag!
I'm sure you're wondering how we were able to sign up as two folks at one seat. So are we!
Keep an eye out for an opening, Pandy! This may be our chance to throw them off!<hr>{pandy}Got it. I'll keep my eyes open.
Keep an eye out for an opening, Pandy! This may be our chance to throw them off!<hr>{pandy}Got it. I'll cover this angle.
Keep an eye out for an opening, Pandy! This may be our chance to throw them off!<hr>{pandy}Got it. I'll look this way.<hr>{!reset}But I've already got this way covered!
We're on a roll, Pandy! Keep up the good work!<hr>{pandy}About that, I still don't really know how to win at five-card draw.<hr>{!reset}Well, me neither.
{pandy}Look alive, my prince! This game could go in any direction!<hr>{!reset}Well, technically, it's all going in the same direction; towards nudity and shamelessness.
H-Hold on, that's blatant cheating! I may as well throw on a shirt as well.<hr>{pandy}Let it go, my prince... We still have a chance to win.
Nice!<hr>{pandy}Nice!
Nice!<hr>{pandy}Nice!
Er, don't listen to her, Mòrag! She's talking complete nonsense!
Er, don't listen to her, Brighid! She's talking complete nonsense!
For your information, Pandoria here is one of the strongest Blades in Alrest! Her control over lightning is second to none!
Pandoria is the strongest electric-affinity Blade in all of Alrest, thank you very much!
I don't think we can make any promises of that, Nonon.<hr>{pandy}The prince would get all flustered if we did any PDA, anyway.
As the Driver, I'm the one who does most of the sword swinging, while Pandy empowers me. However, we do combine our strengths for our special moves!
{pandy}Well, you are already wearing a choker, my prince. Now we just need to get you on a rope...{!reset}<hr>P-Pandy, don't listen to her!

{pandy}Hmm... You are already wearing a choker, Zekey. Now I just need to find a good leash...{!reset}
C-Cag, please don't give Pandy any more ideas!
Pandy got all the cuteness, and I got all the coolness!<hr>{pandy}Don't sell yourself short, my prince! Also, I'm totally cool too!
Cheers, Cag. See, Pandy's cute, and I'm cool. The universe balances itself out.<hr>{pandy]Hey! I'm cool tool! And you're cute sometimes, like uhm... and uh...
You're a very observant girl, Cag. Normally, if a Driver perishes, then the Blade would return to its Core Crystal, waiting for its next host...
How very observant, as expected of a renowned alchemist. If a Driver perishes, then the Blade returns to its Core Crystal, going dormant until a new Driver claims them.
{pandy}Good one, Nonon.{!reset}<hr>In my early teens, I came across Pandy's Core Crystal.
It might surprise you to know that our technology is surprisingly advanced. We have guns, shield generators, and all sorts! Pandy is just a part of the Blades system.
{pandy}I get that some people who come here are from waaay in the past, but not us! Our world has advanced technology-- I'm just one part of that, really!
Of course, Sucrose! Have a look around you, we're not the only ones doing it!<hr>{pandy}And I'd never abandon my prince!
Unfortunately, Tantal is not doing so well because of various factors. I wanted to meet with other titans and try and fix our many problems...
My home titan, Tantal, isn't doing so hot for a few reasons. I wanted to visit other nations and find solutions to our problems...
As a Driver and Blade, we're just more inseparable than the two of you!<hr>{pandy}Plus, I wanted to play with only half the responsibility.
The bond between a Driver and Blade makes us even greater than a normal relationship!<hr>{pandy}Plus, it's an excuse to play while sharing cards with someone else.
I'll clear things up, Jura. Pandoria provides me with the Purple Lightning Dreamsmasher, and charges me up with electrical power beyond compare!
It's simple, Jura. The Purple Lightning Dreamsmasher and its phenominal electric powers are provided by Pandy, and I smash the foes to bits!
Pandy and I are an item, you could say. She is my Blade, and as her Driver, she has resonated with me.<hr>{pandy}We can explain, if you want?
Oh, Dunban, please! I discarded all need for formality when I became a wandering vagrant! "The Mighty Zekenator" will suffice!
Of course! We go everywhere together, as Driver and Blade!<hr>{pandy}I'd never abandon my prince! He needs my assistance, after all.
Pandy here has been my Blade for years, now. I awakened her from her Core Crystal at a young age, and we've been inseparable ever since.
Why thank you, Sucrose!<hr>{pandy}I think that's the most generous way anyone has ever described our eccentricity.
Cat caught your tongue, Sucrose? Are you perhaps awed by our incredible fighting aura?
Care to explain your intentions, Sucrose? Just so that we're all clear.
I find a direct approach is usually the best one, Sucrose! If you have something to say, then be out with it.
What sort of a cold reception is that?<hr>{pandy}Heheh! Thank you for the kindness, Prince Miko.
{pandy}My prince, I think Zoe is starting to go braindead looking at your abs.<hr>{!reset}Can't blame her, really.
Naturally, I've made use of different Blades all the time. However, Pandoria is special. She's one of a kind!
I fully understood it when I was told that other worlds don't have the Driver and Blade system, but men and women being separated still boggles me.
It still boggles my mind that in your universe, men and women are from different worlds. I can get that you don't have Blades, but that still confuses me.
We haven't yet crossed the point of wanting to raise a child, though we have thought of a few.<hr>{pandy}I refuse to call my child Panzeke, but something modern like Linka would be cool.
I'm pretty sure if you told her about this, the special inquistor would have me hanged.<hr>{pandy}Plus, I don't think the prince needs to keep that sort of thing secret from me.
{pandy}You make it sound like being with the prince is a chore. It's more like a new adventure, every day.
{pandy}You don't exactly get paid to be someone's Blade, but being with the prince is like going on a new adventure every single day. So, I'm happy!
A pirate? What, you take me for some rugged blaggard, stealing from merchantile sailors with reckless abandon?! I feel insulted.
{pandy}It looks like a hat, doesn't it? Technically, it's part of my body, like my dress is. Well, not my `body', but my physical form. I could unplug it if I wanted to.
We are a couple, Mari. Though before that, we were just as inseparable as a Driver and Blade pair!
To make it clear, yes, we are a couple Mari. Though we're also a Driver and Blade pair!<hr>{pandy}Yeah! And I'm really happy to travel alongside my prince.
Pandy here is a top-notch Blade. Her power synergises perfectly with my own, and as she provides me with the Big Bang Edge, the Zekenator is unstoppable!
It's true. Pandy here is one of the strongest electric-affinity Blades in Alrest!
Thankfully, we haven't yet found any zombies on our journeys. But if we did, we would take them out in a split second!
That's right, Meia! We're one of the strongest Driver-Blade pairs in Alrest!

state.text: {pandy}You've got that right, Meia! The prince isn't called Thunderbolt Zeke for no reason-- we're one of the strongest teams in Alrest!

case.state: {pandy}Even a lady like Jura can't resist your manly charms, Zeke!<hr>{!reset}You think so, eh?
Excellent, you get it, Jura! Tell me, what sort of cool move names do you have for your flourishes? My personal favourite is the Ultimate Lightning Fury Slash Max!
Ah, you may say that, Dunban, but we're living in sin for this moment in time.
We have been told that in the past, yes. And it may have made the Zekenator blush before, but no more!<hr>{pandy}We don't really go for normal terms for our relationship anyway.
It was so long ago now, wasn't it? I can hardly remember the details. I was given Pandy's core crystal when I was a young lad, and I awakened her from her hibernation.
Ah, yes. The tale of how we met. Truth be told, the details are lost to the fog of memory, but I awakened her from her core crystal when I was a young lad.
My trousers, of course!<hr>{pandy}He needs that many belts for two reasons. One, the armor weighs a tone. And two, they make him look tough.
They're keeping my trousers up, naturally.<hr>{pandy}He needs a lot of belts to keep his pants up; the armour weighs a lot. Plus, they make him look cool.
Yes.<hr>{pandy}Yeah.
Naturally.<hr>{pandy}Duh.
{pandy}Yeah, I can! See? It's kinda a part of my body, really.{!reset}<hr>Blades come in all sorts of forms, you see.
Your curiosity may put you in danger, CD! For you see, this eyepatch conceals a power too great for this world to handle -- the Eye of Shining Justice!
{pandy}Yeah, I guess you could call it a date?{!reset}<hr>Pandy and I tend to go everywhere together as part of our thrilling, ongoing adventure!
Usually I just try to find the strongest monster I can find and actually smack in the face. That's my routine.
I think that's actually a pretty apt description, Leon.<hr>{pandy}No, Blades aren't bio-organic. I'm more like... silicon-based?
It's natural to feel humbled by the presence of the Zekenator, chum! You aren't giving yourself enough credit, mate.
Pandy and I share everything, including partners. Having attraction for other men and women is something we share equally.
There's nothing between us that isn't shared - including interest in potential partners, in fact.
{pandy}Blades are meant to work in tandem with their Drivers. I'm not his servant, I'm his partner!
{pandy}The prince is my partner, my equal. Drivers and Blades need to work in tandem, or they won't get anything done-- I'm not his servant.
It's hard to pick just one, really. The people of Mor Ardain were really quite hardy, but the Leftherian Archipelago is absolutely beautiful in clear weather!
A difficult question, Yae. Mor Ardain had some very hardy and earnest people, but the Leftherian Archipelago offered a view like non other!
Jura, that... never occurred to me! Pandy, what if I start turning into a half-Blade hybrid!<hr>{pandy}Stay calm, Zekey! It hasn't happened yet, so you're probably fine! Probably.
You're joking?! That's... no! Impossible! My three of a kind, completely worthless?!
No! It can't be! My three of a kind... completely worthless...
My options now are to strip away my curtain of belts... Or I could just take off my entire coat for you!<hr>{pandy}Great choice.
We lost? Pandy, what comes next for you? I mean, you aren't armored like I am.<hr>{pandy}Guess I've gotta take off my dress, then?
{pandy}Aw, we lost. You know, I can't really take off my shoulder bulbs, or anything.{!reset}<hr>Quite. I suppose your dress may have to be next, hmm?
Ah, well! Can't expect to stay out of harm's way forever!
Blast! We've lost another one. Say, Pandy, what comes off next for you?<hr>{pandy}Hmm... Guess I'd better get rid of my dress.
This was a calculated loss to keep things fair, I assure you. You ready, Pandoria?<hr>{pandy}Yeah, sure.
What do you think, Pandoria?<hr>{pandy}I think we're going to lose our lead if this keeps up...
Ahh, yes. The great equalizer. Well, this'll be farewell to my many, many belts!

Are you ready for this, Pandoria?
{pandy}Yep! It's time for the biggest reveal of all.
Blast! There go our chances at having a flawless victory.
Bugger! It would've been cool as hell to pull off a flawless victory for once!
There go our chances at a no-hit run.<hr>{pandy}Ehh, we'll be fine! Can't win them all, right?
Win some, lose some. Are you alright for it, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}Yeah!
Sometimes, it's hard to know where you went wrong.<hr>{pandy}And other times, it's really easy!
We're fearless and fighting fit, even with another loss to our name!<hr>{pandy}Yeah!
Haha, you fell for it! Now, the Bringer of Chaos will unleash his-- Oh drat we lost, didn't we?<hr>{pandy}Yes, my prince...
So, it's come down to this. Fine then, I shall strip once again!<hr>{pandy}Aaand of course, I'll back you up!
Well, well. It's the end of the line for us as far as our gear is concerned.<hr>{pandy}Aww. Such a shame. The journey was just as much fun as the nudity-filled destination.
The Zekenator isn't afraid of taking a few hits here or there!
A darn shame. These pauldrons do wonders for my look, don't they?<hr>{pandy}So that's what you settled on already? Alright then...
Hold on a 'mo. I was going to take my coat off next. Pandoria, what does that mean for you?<hr>{pandy}Er... My bra, I suppose?
Boots or belts next, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}If you take off your belts, your pants are just gonna come down.
Hey, hold on a moment! I'm not ready yet! Blast it all, I'll have to take off these belts of mine. And that means...
It's almost a shame to do so poorly. The Zekenator has struck out.<hr>{pandy}Don't feel too bad, my prince. It's all in good fun, right?
Pandy here is a kind of life form that starts out in a Core Crystal. I resonated with her crystal, and it allowed her to take human form. It's quite common in our world.
To keep it simple, Pandy is an artificial life form that comes out of that Core Crystal in her chest. I resonated with her crystal, which allowed her to manifest.
Oh, we absolutely will be like this the whole time.
What? Of course not!<hr>{pandy}The prince takes his workout routine very seriously. Plus, I can't even lift the Big Bang Edge, and it comes from me!
Of course not! In fact, here's a little tidbit for you. Pandy's weapon, the Big Bang Edge, is so phenomenal even she cannot lift it by herself!
In a manner of speaking. Our relationship was strictly platonic for most of the time we've known each other. After our most recent adventure, though...
Is that what you were worried about? Don't worry, Sucrose. You'll find the right man or woman who shares an affinity for your scientific pursuits!
Well, well. Someone's feeling a little bit bold to~background.time~, eh?<hr>{pandy}Sucrose is really bad at hiding her emotions... heh.
Well, well. Someone's feeling a little bit bold to~background.time~, eh?<hr>{pandy}Sucrose is really bad at hiding her emotions... heh.
This sort of bond is one you find between a Driver and Blade who truly get each other! Let us be an example for all to learn from!

Why, how flattering.
{pandy}You know, there's one good way to get experience~
I'm the Driver, Pandy's the Blade. She's able to summon forth a greatsword, the Big Bang Edge, which I use to deal with our foes!
Pandy here is the Blade. She's able to summon forth the Big Bang Edge, a greatsword which I wield with expert skill!
That blasted father of mine has kept the country locked down for so long. If only he would realize that the other titans could help ours... bah.
Tantal wasn't in a good spot to begin with, what with our titan being so old, but my father has kept up the isolationism for so long. If only he would see sense...
I imagine people look at me with some amount of jealousy. Pandy is a rare blade, after all.<hr>{pandy}Yeah...
{pandy}I've seen people giving the prince some jealous looks because of me.{!reset}<hr>You are a rather rare kind of Blade, after all.
Our incredible bond means ether flows excellently between the two of us. Though, we do have a little extra secret... This Core Crystal shard, to be precise.
Not only do we have an incredible bond that makes the ether flow excellently, we have a dark secret on top of that -- this Core Crystal shard, to be precise.
You may want to prepare yourself then, Jura. For what you're about to see isn't your average specimen.
I think you'd best brace yourself, Jura.<hr>{pandy]Don't take the prince as an example of the average size...
I've love to see a Vandread in action. Please, do tell us about them in great detail.<hr>{pandy}I feel like it'll go over your head...
We never stray too far, either. Though part of that is because we have to fight as a team, we can't do it solo.
Some Drivers treat their Blades more like disposable servants. It's an unfortunate way of life in some parts of Alrest. But I'd never dream of treating anybody that way!
Blades were a subservient race by way of their very nature-- A Driver needs to awaken them, so they get treated as inferiors. But anybody with decent morals wouldn't think of it in a million years!
Sounds like an undercooked move name, if you ask me. You need to give it more gravitas! You need to rumble your opponents when you shout it!
Look at it this way; you get two strips for the price of one!<hr>{pandy}Plus, I dunno what I'd do if I got into a table without Zeke, or vice versa...

She joined me when I was banished from Tantal, and went to travel across Alrest.
{pandy}Then we became envoys for the Indoline Praetorium...
{pandy}My prince? I think she's struggling to come up with words.
{pandy}Actually, I'm a Blade because I summon a big sword. The prince is the only one able to wield it convincingly.<hr>{!reset}There's more to it than that.
Excuse me?<hr>{pandy}Hah! That's funny, but I'm seriously happy with the prince.
Excuse me?<hr>{pandy}Hah! That's funny, but you don't need to worry. I love being with the prince!
{pandy}Well, being the prince's Blade means we get to go a lot of places, meet a lot of people, and fight a lot of cool monsters!{!reset}<hr>And to look cool while doing it.

{pandy}Being a Blade for someone as eccentric as the prince means I get to go a lot of places, meet a lot of interesting people, and fight a lot of cool monsters!{!reset}<hr>And to look awesome while doing so.
{pandy}Don't worry about it, Mari. The prince and I have a bit of a bad history with bandits, is all. We see ourselves as allies of justice!

{pandy}Yep! I'm an electro-Blade, so I can make all my different bulbs glow in the dark.{!reset}
And that's the least of what she can do!
That's right; the Core Crystal is the heart of a Blade. Though, rare circumstances mean that, even as a human, I share something with Pandy...
You can think of a Core Crystal as being the heart and soul of a Blade. Now, brace yourself, because a rare circumstance means that Pandy has to share a bit of it with me...
That's right! Driver and Blade, stripping together!<hr>{pandy}The prince needs my help, after all!

Well... that would require us to be married, first, and--
{pandy}We aren't there just yet! Plus, my prince was kind of disowned, but technically I could be one?
As if it would be for a reason as pragmatic as that! Though... the Zekenator is concealing a hidden secret in his boxers...

Hah! As if it would be for something as lame and practical as that!
{pandy}Although, you are on the larger side where it counts, my prince...
Only when we're in the mood, usually indoors, and... not always.<hr>{pandy}We like to shake it up a lot!
Actually, we like to switch it up now and then. I like seeing Pandy on top of me now and again.<hr>{pandy}It's usually a heat of the moment kinda thing...
{pandy}Oh, I provide the giant sword that he uses to smack the big monster in the face!{!reset}<hr>She's my Blade, you see.
BOWs? Do tell. Anything with an acronym must be worth checking out!<hr>{pandy}Somehow I feel like we'd struggle against them, prince.
There's no point in being subtle!<hr>{pandy}That's not really our style.
{pandy}Don't go taking pictures of my prince's royal jewels, now! You'll need to pay a fine if you try it.{!reset}<hr>Well spoken, Pandy.

Oh no! The Zekenator is completely defenseless without his mighty pauldrons of justice!
{pandy}Pfft! That's a new one.
Avert your eyes, ~human~! Without my pauldrons, my immeasurable power is far less contained!<hr>{pandy}Heh...

Naturally, the Bringer of Chaos doesn't need armor, but it looks cool as hell, doesn't it?
{pandy}It does, but please don't get rid of it mid-fight so you can try and look cool.
Avert your eyes, for the dazzling radiance of both of our naked flesh can be too much for one person to bear!
It's quite understandable if you require a moment to take in the radiant splendor we are about to flash your way...
The wonderful craftsmanship of my boots can't be summarized in a few short words!<hr>{pandy}But you just-- nevermind.
The whole boot comes off! Both of them, in fact!<hr>{pandy}More like all four of them.
As prince of Tantal, I've made it my mission to traverse all of Alrest, seeing how the common man lives!<hr>{pandy}We do a lot of running.
Pandy, a thought occurs. We could only strip off one boot at a time, and we'd get double our money's worth!<hr>{pandy}Don't be silly.{!reset}<hr>You're right. We'd look daft with only one shoe.
I'm warning you, once all these belts come off... my pants are going to descend as well.<hr>{pandy}It's true. Those belts aren't just for show.
{pandy}Last week I had to remind Zeke to put on pants, and here he is losing them in front of strangers!{!reset}<hr>Pandy, you didn't need to tell them that!
{pandy}Wait, is one of those belts new? Did you buy a new one?{!reset}<hr>Buy? No. I was given it for free. {smaller}They were gonna throw it away.

I should probably give you a hazard warning, because you're about to see something big, and dangerous.
{pandy}And it's not a giant boulder this time.
{pandy}You should probably ask permission before trying to take a look at what the Prince is packing!{!reset}<hr>It's alright, Pandy. I'm sure they can handle it.
{pandy}Don't worry, my Prince! I'll strip a few things off too so it won't sting as bad!{!reset}<hr>Thank you, Pandy. Glad to count on you.
{pandy}No slacking, my Prince! I'll zap a few things too so a loss won't sting as bad!{!reset}<hr>Cheers, Pandy. I'm glad to have you.
My knuckles are nice and clean for what's about to follow!<hr>{pandy}Uhh... Do you wanna try that one again?{!reset}<hr>No, no! I know what I said!
You blaggards are in for a right rough time, what with our astounding skill!<hr>{pandy}Yeah! Watch us take our gloves off with expert dexterity!{!reset}
I'm not saying it. Pandy?<hr>{pandy}The gloves are coming off!{!reset}<hr>Thanks, babe.
It's more that Pandy is able to create the weapon that I wield. She is a Blade, after all. In battle, we channel ether back and forth to power ourselves up.
{pandy}Actually, because I'm a Blade, I'm able to create the weapon that the prince wields. And we fight in tandem, bouncing power back and forth to each other!
It's unfortunate, but there's not much one can do as a lone vagabond.
{pandy}Things aren't that different, then, even when your men are from other planets...
Maybe our worlds have more in common than we thought!
Maybe our worlds have more in common than you'd think. Those Crystals could be your equivalent to a Core Crystal.
Somehow, I get the feeling Nonon doesn't like me.<hr>{pandy}Don't worry, my prince. I'll look out for you.
{pandy}Hey, that's just how it happens! I can't control what kind of Blade I am...
Yes, exactly!<hr>{pandy}First shellhead, now meathead? You've gotta stop taking the bait, Zekey...
{pandy}You'd be quite the catch! You just need to find another bookworm to snuggle with.
We're always interested in adding a new spice to our meal, if that's what you're asking.
I'd say both of us share our interests in as many ways as we can. It so happens that together, we swing both ways, you know.
{pandy}Why, Sucrose, how bold of you!{!reset}<hr>This has all the makings of your lucky day. As it happens, we swing ourselves in both directions.

Well, if you don't mind sharing, then we don't mind going half-and-half, right Pandy?
{pandy}Hehe...
Quite right. There's no need to be sorry when you're honest with your words.<hr>{pandy}And the flattery is appreciated, hehe!
Don't count the Pengs before they've hatched, Mari. You might be the one to lose first! And even if you do, maybe you can have a small peek.
We'll see how things go from here. Even if I don't lose a single extra time, maybe you can have a glance at the end, as a consolation prize.
Don't count the Pengs before they've hatched, Mari. We might not lose a single extra time! ... Maybe you can have a small peek, regardless.
We'll see how things go from here. Even if I don't lose a single extra time, maybe you can have a glance at the end, as a consolation prize.
I suppose it really isn't the same...<hr>{pandy}The prince is a certain kind of rarity, too.
Not every Driver has a set-up like mine. It was a bit of a do-or-die situation, and it was performed by a third party to save my life.
Pandy's Core keeps me alive. A third party handled it while we were in dire straits; it isn't a normal thing for a Driver.
Seems like an awfully awkward seating arrangement, if you ask me.<hr>{pandy}Well, there could be worse arrangements.
If you think that's impressive, just wait until we bust out our dynamic Driver-and-Blade combo moves!<hr>{pandy}Yeah, watch out!

{pandy}Looks like Jura is impressed, my prince!{!reset}
Ha hah!
{pandy}You can say that again, Jura. The prince is above average in all regards.{!reset}<hr>Please, Pandy, you'll make me blush.
{pandy}It's kind of like flexing a muscle. It barely takes me any effort. See?<hr>{!reset}Blades are truly special, aren't they?
{pandy}Hmm... It's kind of like flexing a muscle. I can toggle my lights on and off at will. See?<hr>{!reset}Pandy is special even among Blades, but a few others can do this too.
Oho? What exactly has crossed your mind, Sucrose? Worried that you can't get your hands on Pandy while I'm here?
Hm? Sorry, Sucrose, I didn't quite catch that last part.
{pandy}The prince is anything but boring. I couldn't be happier with him as my Driver.
{pandy}The prince is definitely anything but boring. I'm really happy he's my Driver -- nobody else would even come close!
Well, we were going to...<hr>{pandy}We couldn't budget for a journal for a while, and then when we did, we left it behind a few times, and eventually lost it entirely.
Alas, misfortune has prevented the Zekenator from recording his travels.<hr>{pandy}We finally bought a journal and then we kept losing it.
Thank you rightly, Dunban. And for the record old chap, you aren't so bad looking yourself.
How'd you like to be wedged between the two of us, Dunban? Would that sword of yours be up to the task?
Correct. We have traversed most of Alrest, helping the common man and fighting against injustice wherever we see it. Rather cool, no?
Heh. I like your attitude, Mari. We'll see who will be doing the losing around here-- it won't be us!<hr>{pandy}I mean, it's not certain yet. Losing could be fun...
{pandy}Daw, thanks, Mari! You're pretty cute as well.<hr>{!reset}Indeed! And clearly you have good taste.
{pandy}Aww, don't worry, Mari. You'll find someone like the prince some day. A girl like you is one in a million, in a good way!
{pandy}I do love looking into the prince's eyes... eye, while we do it...<hr>{!reset}And I love seeing your beauitiful framed eyes too, Pandy.
Leon S. Kennedy, you're welcome to spar with us! But beware, for I don't hold back when I get fired up!
Now now, behave, Leon.<hr>{pandy}As if you aren't also thinking about it, my prince.
You could learn a thing or three from us, Leon.<hr>{pandy}Are you a visual learner? Or do you need hands-on experience?
Actually, it's more like i can produce a big sword that my Driver-- the prince-- can wield.
What about your dress, Pandy? That's quite a big loss for you.<hr>{pandy}It's so last season, don't worry about it.
Will you be fine without your dress, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}You do just fine without a dress, too! Although, it's a tempting thought...
{pandy}As you can see, I'm getting rid of my stuff, too! I don't have pauldrons, so the dress had to go!
Try not to stare at either of us for too long -- our magnificence will make you go blind!
{pandy}How do you like that? I'll follow my prince without fear!{!reset}<hr>That's the spirit, Pandy!
So, whose breasts are better? Pandy's, or mine?<hr>{pandy}Your muscles add a lot to your appeal, prince.
You'd never dream of going barefoot in Tantal, unless you were trying to train your endurance, of course!<hr>{pandy}And trust me, you don't wanna!
There we go, nice and barefoot! I feel more free than ever before!<hr>{pandy}Me too, without those booties in the way!
You'd never want to go barefoot in Tantal, unless you want to freeze your toes off in the rolling hills of snow we have!
There we go. Now, we're ninety percent naked... together.<hr>{pandy}Hehe! It's so exciting, isn't it?
Pandy, you really don't have to follow along with me if you don't want to.<hr>{pandy}Don't be stupid, prince. I'd follow you anywhere! I kinda have to.
Feels a little silly to be like this, all things considered.<hr>{pandy}Oh, prince... You're anything but a `little' silly!
Right, there we are then. Bare for all the world to see -- the Zekenator in all his glory!<hr>{pandy}And what a view it is, my prince...
The Bringer of Chaos fears no loss! Let's keep going!<hr>{pandy}You haven't seen anything yet!
Yes, this is perfect. We're just getting started! The Bringer of Chaos is hungry for more!
You must be having the time of your life, chum. You've got myself and Pandy to ogle with those ravenous eyes of yours.
I gather you're a little interested in the fairer sex, chum? Not to worry. If you like, you can look at myself, or at Pandy here.<hr>{pandy}Don't worry about finding a preference right away.
A shame you only have eyes for Pandy, mate. I'd love to show you a good time. Imagine it, a date with the Zekenator--<hr>{pandy}With what money?
Careful, Pandy. If you aren't careful, ~player~ might steal me away from you.<hr>{pandy}Great! More free time for me where I don't have to watch over you.{!reset}<hr>Eh?!
So, this must be the part where we compare our incredible power levels, yes?
Sorry, chap, but it's your turn to throw down!
Alas, my friend! It's time for you to obey the penalty rules!
That's another one down! Too bad for you, ~name~!
Looks like another lad has to pay tribute.
Tsk, tsk. You should've played your hand better, lad.
I'm afraid this is where your line is drawn, ~name~.
Sorry, ~name~ old chum. Looks like you're up!
We're not exactly the pushovers you were expecting us to be, mate!
Your time to shine, ~target~. Right there with ya, chum.
I'm ready to have my mind blown wide open into a million pieces, chum!
Clearly, my incredible muscles and Pandy's delicate form are throwing you off!<hr>{pandy}Delicate form...?
Nice one, chum. Very clever.
Go on then, mate. Show us what you're made of!
Coming to a game like this, letting the whole world see your true form is inevitable!
Show us what you've got, ~target~!
How about a little eye candy for the both of us, chum?
{pandy}You should totally put a little show on for us, ~target~!
{pandy}C'mon, ~target~! Don't be shy! The two of us are already doing this, how much worse can it get?
Nothing left could surprise me, nothing at all!
I dare you, just try and one-up our performance!
Oh hoho! I know what this is -- Pink has revealed her true self!

state.text: Your dark side is no match for the power of the Eye of Shining Justice!

case.state: ... on toast?
{pandy}... on toast?
So, how does this sort of thing work, exactly? Did that hat happen to die, or did you pass away during a holiday event?
Oho! Looks like you've got competition, Pandy! Another girl who has full control over the element of lightning?
What's this? Looks like you've got competition in the field of electricity, Pandy! Able to control everything related to lightning, are you?
Oho, what's this? A member of the Crimson Demon clan in the flesh?
By the Architect, it's a mage from the Crimson Demon clan! Stay on your guard, everyone!

Finally, someone who gets me on a personal level! Does your eyepatch also contain a power too great for mortal minds?
{pandy}Oh, jeez...
{pandy}Wikipe-tan seems pretty smart. Maybe we should ask her?{!reset}<hr>Hmm. Perhaps. Wikipe-tan, do you have any articles about healthcare for titans with low core temperature?
Why not have your dear Barnette stick around for the rest of the game, Jura? The company is always welcome.
So, Jura, why not ask your beloved Barnette to stick around for the rest of the game? Company is always welcome in my book!
Tell me, Jura, what is it about men that catches your interest the most?<hr>{pandy}I wanna know too!
What interest would a lady of beauty and intrigue such as yourself have in the male sex, hmm?<hr>{pandy}I'm kinda curious as well.
Petra, if you're going to lead your country, you need to come up with a super cool title for yourself. Something like... Arbiter of Brigid, Queen of the Isles!
Beatrix, you aren't a Blade per chance, are you? Your features don't really seem fitting for a human, you see.
I suspect you'd love to visit Tantal. Our home's a vast, snowy, cavernous lot. Quite cold all around, but it'd make for a terriffic camping trip.
What's your story, girlie? Have you been a hermit in the mountains for the last twenty years, come to learn about the functions of society?
Tell no lies, Nadeshiko; whom do you fancy more? Pandy, or myself?
So, your name is Queenie. What exactly are you the queen of? Love? Or are you ruler of some magical kingdom?
Zeke von Genbu knows a cutthroat mercenary when he sees one. Tell me, Revy, do you sleep well at night?
Don't think I don't know a mercenary with no morals when I see one. How well can you sleep at night, Revy?
I'm intrigued to learn what this Yae Publishing House actually publishes. Anything easy for the mind to digest?
I've been looking for something easier to digest than The Annals of Addam. What sort of books does your publishing house deal with, eh?
Ever considered writing your own novel, ~target~? One can't help but wonder what ideas are brewing in that mind of yours.<hr>{pandy}Ooh, now I'm curious too.
How much does it cost to maintain that volume of hair? Still, not the most eccentric look we've ever seen.<hr>{pandy}Yeah. Just look at me, for instance.
There's no point in keeping it secret -- someone with an appearance as eccentic as yours must be hiding something. So what is it, Caitlin?

{pandy}Do you think she's...?{!reset}
Caitlin! We demand an answer to a most pressing question!
Are you single?
I feel like seeing the spirit of an undead young lady should really rattle me, but you're on the cute side of the spectrum!
{pandy}Hey, Barnette? How do you think you'd handle swapping places with me for a bit? Think you could handle dealing with the prince?
{pandy}Hey, Barnette! I wanted to ask, do you think you could handle someone like the prince? We could totally trade places for a bit.
{pandy}I thought the point of being a ninja was that nobody could see you. But I can see you clear as day!
I always wondered when we'd run into ninjas. Surprisingly, they haven't really come up on our journey. Unless... they were following us the whole time...
Oh yeah, more of that! Keep it coming!
You're already as good as done for, ~target~!
Behold how easily the tables turn!
An excellent demonstration of how not to win the round!
Please, regale us with tales of your incredible deeds!
Ah yes, please take the lead on this one, ~target~.
You want to say something, Pandy?<hr>{pandy}Bad luck, ~target~. I'm rooting for you!
Slowly but surely, the Zekenator and his trusted blade will work their way through your defenses!
There's nothing more dynamic than the two of us! You barely stand a chance.
Ahaha! The Zekenator is on fire now!
A mere smidgeon of the true power of the Eye of Shining Justice, and ~target~ has lost!
Not enough for ya? Show us a little more then!
I highly recommend you get as naked as possible, as soon as possible!
Oh yes! Looks like you're up, ~name~! Make this a good one!
~Target~, I'll level with you. We're both incredibly aroused right now. Try to keep that energy going, alright?
Mmm, yeah! That's the ticket!
You're a step closer to keeping us company. There are worse fates, eh?
Be glad I didn't unleash my true strength against you!
A tie? Given the circumstances, that's a bit anticlimactic, isn't it?

A tie? Ahahahah!
